DOC.brief_summary: The current study design estimate effect rifampin ( 600 mg orally every 24 hour 7 day ) pharmacokinetics single 30 mg dose ( CP-690,550 ) normal healthy volunteer
DOC.brief_title: Estimate The Effect Of Repeat-Dose Rifampin On The Pharmacokinetics Of CP-690,550 In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject ( nonchildbearing potential ) Clinically significant disease condition Recent serious infection
